oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Vera Maria Ferrão Candau
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bannell, Ralph Ings
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article is an interview on human rights education with one of Latin Americás most prominent human rights educators, Professor Vera Candau. The interview covers her trajectory in human rights education, the relationship between human rights education, liberalism and socialism, the question of interculturality and the role of human rights education inschools and informal educational contexts.
